mapper.select: select * from categoryMain where categoryMainCode=#{categoryMainCode} || categoryMainName=#{categoryMainName};
select * from categoryMain order by categoryMainCode desc;
select * from categoryMiddle where categoryMainCode=#{vo.categoryMainCode} and categoryMiddleCode=#{vo.categoryMiddleCode} and categoryMiddleName=#{vo.categoryMiddleName};

select * from categorySub where categoryMainCode = #{vo.categoryMainCode} and categoryMiddleCode = #{vo.categoryMiddleCode} and categorySubCode = #{vo.categorySubCode} and categorySubName = #{vo.categorySubName};
select * from dbProduct order by idx desc limit 1;
select * from categorySub where categoryMainCode = #{categoryMainCode} and categoryMiddleCode = #{categoryMiddleCode};
select * from dbProduct where categoryMainCode = #{vo.categoryMainCode} and categoryMiddleCode = #{vo.categoryMiddleCode} and categorySubCode = #{vo.categorySubCode};

select *,(select categoryMainName from categoryMain where categoryMainCode=#{vo.categoryMainCode}) as categoryMainName, (select categoryMiddleName from categoryMiddle where categoryMiddleCode=#{vo.categoryMiddleCode}) as categoryMiddleName, (select categorySubName from categorySub where categorySubCode=#{vo.categorySubCode}) as categorySubName from dbProduct where productName = #{vo.productName};
select categorySubName from categorySub group by categorySubName order by categorySubName;

select.if: select * from dbProduct where mainPrice < #{mainPrice} order by idx desc;

select product.*, sub.categorySubName from dbProduct product, categorySub sub where sub.categorySubName = #{part} and substring(product.productCode,4,3)=sub.categorySubCode and mainPrice < #{mainPrice} order by idx desc;
